text:
Information Section
HEADQUARTERS UNITED STATES ARMY INFANTRY CENTER
Fort Benning. Georgia
12 August 1958
Mr* Robert E, Underwood, Jr,
Network Manager
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
119 Gregory HaH
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr, Underwood:
Please find enclosed a list of the "Queen of Battle" programs we have
chosen for use by the NAEB network. Tapes of the actual programs will
be mailed in the very near future, as soon as revision is complete on
two programs we felt were good but contained technical errors.
The number of each program corresponds to the number given for that
program in the promotional brochure, (A copy is enclosed) You will
note that in two or three instances, titles given in the listing do
not match those in the brochure. These are new programs that have
been produced and inserted into the series since the brochure was
printed.
If there is anything more that you need, other than the tapes themÂ¬
selves of course, please let us know.
1st Lt, Inf,
Chief, Radio Unit
